account_link.title: Connect Your Nest Account
account_link.description:
Follow these steps to get your credentials:

1. Open an **Incognito/Private** browser window
2. Enable **third-party cookies** in browser settings
3. Go to [home.nest.com](https://home.nest.com) and sign in with Google
4. Open **Developer Tools** (F12) → **Network** tab → Check **Preserve Log**
5. In the filter box, type `issueToken` and copy the full **Request URL**
6. In the filter box, type `oauth2/iframe`, click the last request, and copy the entire **Cookie** header value

⚠️ Do not log out of home.nest.com after copying credentials

data_description.cookies: Complete cookie string from the oauth2/iframe request headers
